statements: DELETE FROM SalesData WHERE CustomerName = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM SalesData WHERE CustomerName = 'John Doe' AND SaleAmount > 500;
DELETE FROM sales_data WHERE sale_id = 101 AND sale_date >= '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM sales_trends WHERE trend_id IN (1, 2, 3);
DELETE FROM sales_orders WHERE customer_id = 'a0eebc99-9c0b-4ef8-bb6d-6bb9bd380a11' AND product_id = 'b3156ed8-117e-422b-8511-0c07b2deee81';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM orders WHERE order_date < '2022-01-01');
